movies.title: Muhammad: The Messenger of God
movies.plot: Abousofyan tells Aboutaleb, Muhammad's uncle, that in the upcoming morning he wants to kill the holy prophet of Islam and Muslims, who are in boycott. Aboutaleb remembers the past years when Abraha charges ahead Mecca to ruin the house of God. but by God's will his army loses out against millions of small birds sent by GOD. A month later, Muhammad is born.
movies.simplePlot: The events, trials and tribulations of the city of Makkah in 7th century AD.

biography.bio: Mahdi Pakdel is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015), The Freeway (2012) and The Fish Fall in Love (2006).
biography.name: Mahdi Pakdel

biography.bio: Sareh Bayat was born and raised in Tehran, Iran. She majored in Theater at university and received a Diploma of Honor for Best Actress from Tehran's Police Theatre Festival in 2001. She furthered her acting training at Karnameh Institute of Arts and Culture's School of Cinematic Arts where she received lessons by renowned actor, Parviz Parastui, in 2005. Bayat first appeared on the small screen in a television series called "A Fistful of Eagle Feathers" alongside her teacher, Parviz Parastui, and other celebrated actors such as Reza Kianian, and Hormoz Hedayat. Her big screen debut was in "Devil's Take" (Moghalede Sheytan) directed by Parvaneh Afshin Sadeghi. Her performance as Razieh, the religious caretaker in Asghar Farhadi's internationally critically acclaimed film, A Separation (2011), received the Diploma of Honor for Best Actress in a Supporting Role and Silver Bear from Berlin International Film Festival.
biography.name: Sareh Bayat

biography.bio: Mina Sadati is an actress, known for Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015), Kami's Party (2013) and Mina's Choice (2016).
biography.name: Mina Sadati

biography.bio: Ali Reza Shoja-Nuri is a producer and actor, known for Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015), The Fateful Day (1995) and Doubt (2009).
biography.name: Ali Reza Shoja-Nuri

biography.bio: Mohsen Tanabandeh is an actor and writer, known for Quelques kilos de dattes pour un enterrement (2006), Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015) and A Petition for Allah (2008).
biography.name: Mohsen Tanabandeh

biography.bio: Dariush Farhang is a director and actor, known for Do film ba yek belit (1990), Telesm (1988) and Ravani (1997). He has been married to Rozita Arbabian since 1999. They have one child. He was previously married to Susan Taslimi.
biography.name: Dariush Farhang

biography.bio: Siamak Adib was born on April 28, 1974 in Kermanshah, Iran. He is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015), There Are Things You Don't Know (2010) and Tales (2014).
biography.name: Siamak Adib

biography.bio: Mohammad Asgari is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Messenger of God (2015).
biography.name: Mohammad Asgari

biography.bio: Ra'na Azadivar is an actress, known for À propos d'Elly (2009), Sound and Fury (2016) and The Girl's House (2015).
biography.name: Ra'na Azadivar

biography.bio: Sadegh Hatefi is an actor and writer, known for Simorgh (1987), The Highschool (1986) and So'oud (1988).
biography.name: Sadegh Hatefi
